rows.label: qst102203_msg0001
rows.name: Ah, wonderful! You made it!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0002
rows.name:
I hear Nis invited you to join?
Sorry to bring you all the way out here.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0003
rows.name:
Your job is to take care of a few
monsters around the camp area.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0004
rows.name:
I can't run a mission without ensuring
my squad's safety, you understand.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0005
rows.name:
The monsters you're looking
for are three Gamen Grebel
and three Dusky Riik.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0006
rows.name:
Take out that many, and the rest of
'em will get the message, I reckon.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0007
rows.name: Good luck out there!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0101
rows.name:
You're looking for three Gamen Grebel
and three Dusky Riik.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0102
rows.name:
Show me those skills that
Vandham thought so highly of!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0201
rows.name:
Damn, you're done already?
Nice work!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0202
rows.name:
We were just finishing up the first stage
of the mission here, too. Let's take a
break and have a bite to eat.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0203
rows.name:
To celebrate Nis's first mission,
I've put him on cooking duty!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0204
rows.name:
Vandham did the same for me on my
first mission back in the day, you know!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0205
rows.name:
It's our little tradition!
Hahahah!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0206
rows.name:
Really? That'd be great.
You go ask Nis if there's
anything he needs help with.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0207
rows.name:
Maybe we'll get to dig in
a bit earlier than I expected!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0301
rows.name:
Now, I don't have any problems
with Nis's skills in battle...

rows.label: qst102203_msg0302
rows.name:
But he has this tendency to get
paranoid about his allies' safety.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0303
rows.name:
I just hope he doesn't let it
worry him too much.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0401
rows.name:
Shade Trout and a Tarnish Apple, eh?
I see, I see...

rows.label: qst102203_msg0402
rows.name:
Well, you can catch Shade Trout
right in this river. They're pretty
common upstream.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0403
rows.name:
As for Tarnish Apples...
Hmm, where would they be?

rows.label: qst102203_msg0404
rows.name:
'Fraid I can't actually recall.
They're pretty rare, I can tell you that.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0501
rows.name: All righty then! Time for some grub!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0601
rows.name:
You know, that Nis lad's food
wasn't half bad.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0602
rows.name:
It had a...what do you call it, a Gulan
kick to it? That fresh, spicy taste.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0603
rows.name:
Oh, but I'm rambling on, aren't I?
You want to hear your next task.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0604
rows.name:
Well, I want you to go find me a
Shining Stalactite.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0605
rows.name:
I heard you can find them somewhere
here in Spirit Crucible Elpys, but I've
yet to come across one.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0606
rows.name: I'm counting on you, yeah?

rows.label: qst102203_msg0607
rows.name:
While you're doing that, we're off to
take out two Brutal Aspid.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0608
rows.name:
They're meant to be pretty
vicious buggers.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0609
rows.name:
It might be a bit tough on Nis,
for a first mission, but it's a good
chance for him to prove himself!

rows.label: qst102203_msg0610
rows.name:
Your Shining Stalactite search might be
too easy by comparison, but hey, you
already took out a bunch of monsters.

rows.label: qst102203_msg0611
rows.name: Well then, I guess we'll see you round!
